item.title: Creating a PDF file in Java
item.description: jPDFCreator.java import com.itextpdf.text.BaseColor; import com.itextpdf.text.Chapter; import com.itextpdf.text.Document; import com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException; import com.itextpdf.text.Font; import com.itextpdf.text.FontFactory; import com.itextpdf.text.List; import com.itextpdf.text.ListItem; import com.itextpdf.text.PageSize; import com.itextpdf.text.Paragraph; import com.itextpdf.text.Section; import com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter; import java.io.FileNotFoundException; import java.io.FileOutputStream; /** * * @author dhanoopbhaskar */ public class jPDFCreator { Document document = null; PdfWriter pdfWriter = null; public jPDFCreator() { /** * Creating an instance of com.itextpdf.text.Document * The arguments * -page size * -left margin * -right margin * -top margin * -bottom margin */ document = new Document(PageSize.
